title: Chapter II - Regulation of Land Use and Development and Subdivision of Land
content:
Chapter II - Regulation of Land Use and Development and Subdivision of Land

State Regulations

Part 571 - Determination of Agency Permit or Variance Jurisdiction (§ 571.1 to 571.5)

Part 572 - Procedures for the Review of Projects (§ 572.1 to 572.23)

Part 573 - Jurisdiction of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act (§ 573.1 to 573.8)

Part 574 - Standards for the Review of Projects Pursuant to the Adirondack Park Agency Act (§ 574.1 to 574.8)

Part 575 - Shoreline Restrictions of the Adirondack Park Agency Act (§ 575.1 to 575.7)

Part 576 - Standards For The Review Of Variances Pursuant To The Adirondack Park Agency Act (§ 576.1 to 576.9)

Part 577 - Special Provisions Relating to Wild, Scenic and Recreational Rivers (§ 577.1 to 577.11)

Part 578 - Special Provisions Relating to Freshwater Wetlands (§ 578.1 to 578.14)

Part 579 - Special Provisions Relating To Projects By State Agencies (§ 579.1 to 579.5)

Part 580 - Hearing Procedures (§ 580.0 to 580.20)

Part 581 - Enforcement (Subpart 581-1 to 581-4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
